show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #74 Maggie and Jeremiah Eubank "Unrealistic Stakes"
subtitle: #74 Maggie and Jeremiah Eubank "Unrealistic Stakes"
summary:
This week my friends Maggie and Jeremiah Eubank join me on Zoom from their ranch in the Texas hill country to talk about what it's like raising hogs around a feral hog population. We talk about dogs and how they relate to sheep predation and their experience with farmer's markets.
